**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line:
>
> /kind feature

/kind bug

**What happened**:
In [cloud node controller(line 380)](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/pkg/controller/cloud/node_controller.go#L380), the controller add NodeNetworkUnavailable to the node conditions, and use `cnc.kubeClient.CoreV1().Nodes().Update(curNode)` to update it. But node status can not be updated by `Nodes().Update()`, it doesn't work because [node update strategy(line 79)](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/2fcac6abf27a3912a71f590300b72c2e48266120/pkg/registry/core/node/strategy.go#L79) replace the node status with old status. 
To fix this bug, we should use `nodeutil.SetNodeCondition()` to update node status.

/sig cluster-lifecycle
/area cloudprovider
